sentence.Network_en: That perceived disingenuousness may back to bite Beijing, in two ways.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种认知上的不诚形为可能在两方面上会反咬北京一口.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE词汇备考：GRE易混词汇整理... ... abstain v. 戒绝,放弃 disingenuousness n. 不坦白,不真诚 ingeniousness n. 聪明,天才.

list.abs: More than that he seems disingenuous ; in fact , his smile looks phony too ., 更有甚者 , 他似乎并无诚意 , 事实上 , 他的笑容也显得虚伪.
disingenuouslydisingenuousness disinherit 失继承权disinheritance disintegrate 分解分裂分化瓦解破裂崩溃粉碎分.
To attribute that entirely to Mr Obama would be disingenuous ., 把这完全归咎于奥巴马是不诚实的.
Hence the disingenuous compromise of " truth within a relevant discipline " ., 因此 , 对 " 相关学科真理 " 的虚伪妥协也是如此.

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being disingenuous and lacking candor
